nodes.bodyText: jobs with h2 suffix has h2 agent - label 'centos' or label 'h2'?
All above including this are h2 agents
Let's rename the check-sql profile to sql-scripts to be more close to the current job name. Could be in a separate ticket.
I agree on both. I updated them here, and will adjust the labels in scope of CAM-12866 in the shared library.
